Well here's the thing - valve is one of those companies that are like coal deep underground, which, with time (a heck lot of it), will give you, you guessed it! DIAMONDS!!! So what can I say about this game? Its perfection with a cherry on top. And yes, I'm taking into account of how it falls into place with Portal (1). I'm basically a die hard fan of Half Life and I never thought I could compare something equally until Portal came out. And I'm not being biased towards Valve. I was surprised that valve did it AGAIN (after HL)! You play this game and, well, think (again) how much bang you got for your buck. How's the graphics you ask? Their Source engine is made out of magic. It is surprising how well the game renders in mid-end and even low end systems without lag. 10/10 on every bit of the game in my opinion. So to sum it up - BUY IT!

    ......Ps the cake may be a lie but the game isn't (for sure) - forgive my randomness ;)

I'm sure at this point that anyone getting portal is someone who's just "getting around" to it like I was last year, but if you're one of those who for any reason has been hesitant to try it, you're missing out. The game is funny, challenging, unique, and, above all, genius. I have never seen anything like the Portal series and imagine it'll be a long time before any other such gem shall enter the world. The game appeals to the little rebel in us all. You can't help but love your four instructors. The pre-recorded messages provide more comic relief than emotional support or instruction. GLaDOS, although always insulting, clearly "cares" about you. Wheatley is always so eager, even after- wait! No spoilers! Cave Johnson, the founder of the company, has such a twisted view of the world but presents it in such a charismatic and matter-of-fact way that you almost don't notice. The game is really one of the best I've ever played.

Best. Game. Ever.

Un juego muy recomendado, uno de los mejores juegos de Valve hasta ahora. Si Portal era un formula innovadora, Portal 2 lo destrozo. Muchisimos elementos nuevos. Una trama muy buena, conociendo muchisimas cosas nuevas de la historia y quedando muchisimos cabos sueltas para una continuación. El modo Coop es excelente sin duda, ya que pone a prueba el ingenio de ambos. El Creador de camaras asegura que la diversión será infinita, ya que siempre habrá contenido nuevo para este juego. Sin duda vale mucho más que cualquier Call of Duty. Welcome to aperture science^^
